channel.title: StonerScape.com | Fun Server | Remix/All Star Style | Adding Quests Soon
channel.description:
[left][IMG]http://png.findicons.com/files/icons/1581/silk/16/controller.png[/img][URL=http://"stonerscape.com"]Play[/URL]
Base: Deadlypvpz v3
StonerScape is almost 2 weeks and is starting to begin become better and better, I(eddie) started with deadlypvpz base, just enjoying doing simple basic coding/editing everyday.Learning new things as I make this community, learning and talking new people and getting honest advice and having fun is what server is about :). Welcome to play Stonerscape hope on, we got chill staff and an awesome community. This is a pvp server so there is ::master and::pure but no spawning haha. Enjoy guys thanks for taking a look at my noob project, whether your a cool guy or hater. Thanks take care guys!
[SPOILER=Media] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/1nzmgy.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2rm1m36.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2q9010w.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/t06bs0.jpg[/img] [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/vghpfl.jpg[/img]
[/SPOILER][/left]
